Grab the slope coefficients

grab_coeffs.Rd

This is a simple function to grab this slope coefficients of a linear model.

grab_coeffs(lm_obj)

Arguments

lm_obj

the linear model object created by the lm() function

Examples

library(palmerpenguins)
fit<-lm(bill_length_mm~., data = penguins[,-8])
grab_coeffs(fit)

#>       (Intercept)  speciesChinstrap     speciesGentoo       islandDream 
#>      15.343290858       9.835501692       6.117675470      -0.503814879 
#>   islandTorgersen     bill_depth_mm flipper_length_mm       body_mass_g 
#>      -0.127431335       0.300670205       0.069257070       0.001080668 
#>           sexmale 
#>       2.047858829
